item.name: Properties
item.content: Shows the properties of the selected target

item.name: Properties Example
item.content: Example that shows the properties of the selected target

item.name: Outline Example
item.content: Shows the component tree of the selected target

item.name: Styles
item.content: Shows available styles of the selected target

item.name: Constraints
item.content: Shows the constraint properties of top, bottom, left, right, vertical center and horizontal center

item.name: History
item.content: Shows a list of the history of changes with undo and redo support

item.name: Outline
item.content: Shows an tree outline of components. Allows you to select components and set their visibility. This is the component tree not the display list
